MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: ADRC Uniform Data Set v2+v3 - A3: Subject Family History

A3CHG.Description: If Form A3 has been submitted previously and if there have been no changes, check this box and end form here.

PARCHG.Description: If parent information has beeen previously submitted and there have been no changes, check this box and proceed to the next section.

GMOMLIV.Description: Is subject's great mother still living?r

GMOMYOD.Description: Great mother - year of death (Blank if GMOMLIV ≠ 0)

GMOMDEM.Description: Does/did subject's great mother have dementia, as indicated by symptoms, history or diagnosis?

GMOMONSET.Description: Great mother - age of onset (Blank if GMOMDEM ≠ 1)

GDADLIV.Description: Is subject's great father still living?r

GDADYOD.Description: Great father - year of death (Blank if GDADLIV ≠ 0)

GDADDEM.Description: Does/did subject's great father have dementia, as indicated by symptoms, history or diagnosis?

GDADONSET.Description: Great father - age of onset (Blank if GDADDEM ≠ 1)

SIBCHG.Description: If sibling information has beeen previously submitted and there have been no changes, check this box and proceed to the next section.

KIDCHG.Description: If children information has beeen previously submitted and there have been no changes, check this box and proceed to the next section.

RELCHG.Description: If  other blood relatives information has beeen previously submitted and there have been no changes, check this box and proceed to the next section.
